Add a Standalone follower, Donna.
She uses bound weapon spell.
You can find her at Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood.

[b]<Character>[/b]
Name : Donna
Voice  : Female Child
Body   : UNP
Place  : Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood.
Combat style : Bound bow and sword
